Name: Prohibiting food vendors from vending over any ventilation grill, cellar door, manhole, transformer vault, or subway access grating.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting food vendors from vending over any ventilation grill, cellar door, manhole, transformer vault, or subway access grating.

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation due back on 8/13/2004.
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
Section 1. Section 17-315 of Subchapter 2 of Chapter 3 of Title 17 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new subdivision m to read as follows:
m.  No food vendor shall vend over any ventilation grill, cellar door, manhole, transformer vault, or subway access grating.
Â§2. This local law shall take effect 90 days after its enactment.


















LS# 1102
7/8/04
